    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
     
    while(t--)
    {	
    int n, i, j, k=0, carry=0;
    int a[1000]={1};
     
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(j=1; j<=n; ++j)
    {
    for(i=0; i<=k; ++i)
    {	
    //cout<<a[i]<<"bkjbk\n";
    a[i]=a[i]*j+carry;// cout<<a[i];
    carry=a[i]/10;
    a[i]=a[i]%10;
    }
     
    while(carry)
    {
    k++; //cout<<k;
    a[k]=carry%10;
    carry/=10;
    }
     
    }
    for(i=k;i>=0;i--)
    {printf("%d",a[i]);}
    printf("\n");
     
    }
    return 0;
    }
